price: 19. Sungguh, ini adalah peringatan. Barangsiapa menghendaki, niscaya dia mengambil jalan (yang lurus) kepada Tuhannya.
arabic: إِنَّ هَٰذِهِۦ تَذۡكِرَةٞۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلًا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna hādhihi tadhkiratun faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi sabīlan
